solution_line_template: There are {school_year_days} days in the school year and she can miss up to {max_miss_percent_num}% so that's {school_year_days}*{max_miss_percent_decimal} = <<{school_year_days}*{max_miss_percent_decimal}={total_missable_days}>>{total_missable_days} days

Hazel has been sick {days_missed_already} days already and she can only miss {total_missable_days} days or less so she can miss {total_missable_days}-{days_missed_already} = <<{total_missable_days}-{days_missed_already}={remaining_missable_days}>>{remaining_missable_days} more days
